Method Detail

isBalancedClustering

public java.lang.Boolean isBalancedClustering(org.jgrapht.Graph<V,E> g,
                                              java.util.Set<E> edges)
Checks whether a given clustering is balanced or not. A clustering is balanced if every induced cluster has size at most 3/4 * V[G].

Parameters:
g -
edges -
Returns:

bfs

private java.lang.Integer bfs(org.jgrapht.Graph<V,E> g,
                              V v,
                              java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Boolean> visited,
                              java.util.Set<E> edges)
Perform BFS, ignore edges that induce clustering (given by 'edges') and count reachable vertices that have not been seen before.

Parameters:
g - : graph to perform BFS on
v - : starting vertice from G
visited - : markers for vertices to indicate whether or not a given vertice has been visited before
edges - : edges that induce clustering
Returns:
